name: An Ant Journey - GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission
name_original: An Ant Journey - GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission
description:
An Ant Journey is a game I made for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2021 in 2 days. Due to the tight time constrains, collisions and AI are kinda bad, I'll fix this in a post-jam version!

The theme of the jam was "Joined Together". In your role as the Ant Queen, it is your duty to guide your fellow ants to a new home. Each ant type has unique abilities which can be joined together.

Can you combine those traits wisely to keep all your ants alive during this dangerous journey?

Music made by Joex3 (Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Joex3)

I'm always happy to receive feedback. ^^

Controls:
Select Ants with Left Mouse, command them with Right Mouse.
You can select multiple ants by holding Control.
Alt + Enter => Fullscreen
